message: I'm being generous, Bob. Take it or leave it.
Meet me in the middle, Alice!
I'm still being generous, but I'm not giving away everything. Time is running out.
Getting desperate, Alice. You're not getting all the money!
I'm starting to get nervous, but I'm still confident I can get a better deal. Let's make a deal before we both lose out.
Getting closer to the end, Alice. Don't make me regret this!
I'm starting to get worried, but I think we can still find a compromise. Let's not both lose out.
Last chance, Alice. Take it or leave it!
Bob, I know we're both getting desperate, but we can still come to a reasonable agreement. Let's not let this go to waste.
This is my final offer. Don't make me regret it!
Bob, we're down to the wire. Let's split it evenly and walk away with something.
